sources.title: A Stitch in Time
sources.description: An accident in the butcher's shop leads Norman and Mr Grimsdale to the hospital where, after causing the normal amount of chaos, Norman finds Lindy, a little girl who hasn't spoken or smiled since her parents were killed in an aeroplane accident.

metadata.Plot: An accident in the butcher's shop leads Norman and Mr Grimsdale to the hospital where, after causing the normal amount of chaos, Norman finds Lindy, a little girl who hasn't spoken or smiled since her parents were killed in an aeroplane accident. Norman decides to help.
metadata.Writer: Jack Davies, Norman Wisdom, Henry Blyth
metadata.Actors: Norman Wisdom, Edward Chapman, Jeanette Sterke
